attributes.action: Stop adult channels on freeview tv which can be accessed by children

attributes.background: Force tv providers to remove adult channels from freeview that can be easily accessed by children

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what channels to licence for broadcast on freeview TV are a matter for Ofcom, not the Government or Parliament. You can find out more about Ofcom's role, and look up TV broadcast licences, here: https://www.ofcom.org.uk/tv-radio-and-on-demand
